content: When I validated SDC, the errors for QuestionnaireResponse are showing index locations of [0] at every level, even though the row/column locations make clear that the issues are not all on the initial repetitions. See https://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/sdc/qa.html#_scratch_ig-build-temp-N4KLCN_repo_input_examples_questionnaireresponse-sdc-example-ussg-fht-answers. @Grahame Grieve, you'd asked me to poke you here :)
